title: MINECON EARTH 2018官方消息汇总
author: 混乱
txt_content:
ecc42eac7a61534efdb13c2d23d049b0-Header.jpg (88.79 KB, 下载次数: 29)

下载附件

2018-9-30 16:24 上传




MINECON EARTH 2018官方消息汇总EVERYTHING WE ANNOUNCED AT MINECON EARTH 2018村庄和掠夺！新游戏！猫！还有熊猫！等等！Village and Pillage! A new game! Cats! Pandas! More!
今年的MINECON Earth已经结束了，但是好戏才刚刚开始。我们会在MINECRAFT中加入伟大的恶作剧，这些新闻会在2018年剩下的时间里头放出。
MINECON Earth may be over for this year, but the real fun is about to begin. We announced loads of great Minecraft shenanigans, with plenty of news to look forward to for the rest of 2018 and beyond!

下一个MINECRAFT更新：村庄与劫掠
THE NEXT MINECRAFT UPDATE: VILLAGE AND PILLAGE

哼～哼～～哼哼！噢，你不懂村民语？那我只能用土土的中文告诉你这次的更新了。
Hnggh! Hrgggh! Hrghh! Oh, you don't speak Villager-ese? I'll just tell you about the new update in boring old English then.

Jens"Jeb"Bergensten和Agnes Larsson登台宣布了MINECRAFT下一个重大更新，一口气为游戏带来大量的新村民！村庄与劫掠将会让主世界充满全新的友好种族。你甚至可以在不同的生物群系间发现他们的沧桑巨变！请允许我向您介绍丛林生物群系的未来居民：
Jens ‘Jeb’ Bergensten and Agnes Larsson took to the stage and talked about the next big update to Minecraft, one which brings loads of new villagers to the game! Village and Pillage will fill the villages of the Overworld with new friendly folk. You'll even find variations of their designs in different biomes! Allow me to introduce you to the future residents of the jungle biome:





261bb692505f27684b7d1a04e248773b-HereWeGo.jpg (63.46 KB, 下载次数: 37)

下载附件

2018-9-30 16:35 上传




第一行从左到右：图书管理员、屠夫、牧师、制图师、皮匠、造箭师第二行从左到右：牧羊人、农民、渔夫、盔甲商、工具商、武器商Top row from left to right: Librarian, Butcher, Cleric, Cartographer, Leatherworker and Fletcher.Bottom row from left to right: Shepherd, Farmer, Fisher, Armorer, Tool smith and Weaponsmith!

这次更新只有我们的好伙计吗？呃，不全是。坏蛋劫掠者和他们的恶兽也将来到MINECRAFT，要对那些毫无防备的村庄造成各式各样的破坏。这可不妙！这对大家都不妙！Our most friendly update ever then? Er, not exactly. The nefarious Pillagers and their Beasts will be joining Minecraft to cause all kinds of 亦可赛艇 upon unsuspecting villages. That’s not nice! That’s not nice at all!
劫掠者将携带新武器:弩。可喜的是，你也可以制作和使用弩！它们有着比弓更久的攻击间隔，但是威力更大（你可以为弩附魔，它们会变得更强，比如说快速装弹或多重射击或者现在我们还不能说的神秘附魔，真是抱歉）.你能用它更好的保卫村庄免受掠夺者的攻击……Pillagers will be armed with a new weapon, crossbows. Luckily, YOU’LL be able to craft and use crossbows too! They take longer to use than bows, but make up for it with superior power (and they’re even more helpful if you use enchantments on them like fast load or multishot or TOP SECRET ENCHANTMENT WE’RE NOT REVEALING HERE SORRY NOT SORRY) Better start getting ready to defend the villages from the Pillager attacks…
根据你正在访问的生物群系，你会发现村庄的外形变的多种多样（而且会有很多全新的村庄）。虽然建筑用的东西已经很丰富了，但我们希望看到你能用上新的建筑材料！这就是为什么我们要添加——脚手架——在第一次Minecon的提议已经过了七年后（的原因）gtmdMOJANG一个建议能拖7年！它是由竹子制成，那是我们即将宣布的下一个生物爱吃的零食…You’ll find a lot more variety in how villages look depending on what biome you’re visiting, too (along with some completely new villages). But enough about what we’re building - we want to see what YOU make with new building materials! That’s why we’re adding - just seven years after it was suggested at the very first Minecon - scaffolding! It’s made from bamboo, which will be great news for when one of the next mobs we announced wants a snack...
大熊猫和更多的猫咪PANDAS AND MORE CATS

可爱！重磅！来袭！是的！它们即将到来！接下来几周内，我们就会有更多这些可爱的MINECRAFT新生物的消息，关注Minecraft.net！
CUTENESS OVERLOAD INCOMING. Yep, and they'll be incoming very soon! We'll have more news about these adorable new Minecraft mobs in the next few weeks – keep an eye on Minecraft.net!

至于村庄和劫掠，这一更新将在明年加入到MINECRAFT中。
As for Village and Pillage, that update will be coming to Minecraft early next year.
我的世界：地下城MINECRAFT:dungeons[bili=32723221]1[/bili]新游戏！新游戏！新游戏！是的，来自MOJANG的全新游戏！我简直兴奋的要晕过去了，可是我还有一篇文章要完成，现在还不能倒下。你可以在这里阅读更多关于《我的世界：地下城》的内容！NEW GAME! NEW GAME! NEW GAME! Yes, a whole new game from Mojang! I’m so excited I could pass out, if I didn’t have an article to finish. You can read more about Minecraft: Dungeons here!拓展ADD-ONS ADDITIONAL ADD-ONS
Add-ons！它们是修改Minecraft的好方法，你可以在这里了解更多。Jason Major分享了一些令人兴奋的消息，关于如何更新附加组件，让你对你的Minecraft有更多的控制权！以前，Add-ons只允许你修改游戏内现有的生物，现在使用新实体允许添加更多生物了！你可以使用数据驱动生成来控制在你的世界中产生的怪物。动画将为你提供更多自定义选项，你将能够用它制作出骇人的八腿怪物来达成你的梦想和我们的噩梦。 粒子效果能让你为你的怪物添加酷炫的特技。所有这些功能都已经在路上了，您可以在10月3日的Minecraft测试版中试用它们。（点击此处了解有关Minecraft测试版的更多信息！）Add-ons! They’re a great way to modify Minecraft and you can learn more about them here. Jason Major shared some 亦可赛艇 news about how add-ons are being updated to give you even more control over your Minecraft! Previously, add-ons only allowed you to modify existing mobs in the game, but with New Entities you can add more mobs. You can use Data Driven Spawning to control which mobs spawn in your worlds. Animations will give you more customisation options, so you’ll be able to craft the horrifying eight-legged mob of your dreams/our nightmares. Particles will let you pretty up your mobs with cool effects. All of these features are on the way and you can try them in the Minecraft beta on October 3rd. (Click here to learn more about Minecraft betas!)好消息！ Scripting API现在比以往任何时候更接近了。我们知道很多玩家询问这个很久很久很久了，所以我们很高兴宣布Scripting API将在今年晚些时候推出。你不知道什么是Scripting API，想猜猜看API是什么？（阿婆爱？粉发战神？）简单的说，它将允许游戏内创建者创建脚本，然后他们可以将其嵌入到资源包中。我们将在未来有更多关于它如何运行的信息发布在Minecraft.net上。Plus! Scripting API is now closer than ever. We know a lot of players have been asking for this for a looooong time, so we’re thrilled to share that Scripting API will be coming later this year. Not familiar with Scripting API and are currently just trying to guess what API stands for (Apes Purchase Igloo? Awful Pun Incoming?)? Essentially, it’s going to allow in-game creators to create scripts which they can then embed into resource packs. We’ll have more info on how this works on Minecraft.net at a later date.我们从未正式支持Minecraft中的模组开发，但Add-Ons系统与Scripting API相结合将是我们这个时代的开始。We’ve never officially supported modding in Minecraft, but the Add-Ons system combined with the Scripting API is the beginning of the era where we do.生物群系的胜者是——针叶林！THE WINNING BIOME IS – TAIGA!作为MINECON Earth 2018的一部分，我们宣布即将更新Minecraft中三个现有生物群系的计划：针叶林，沙漠和热带草原，由玩家通过投票决定首先更新哪个生物群系。 获胜者是......As a part of MINECON Earth 2018, we announced upcoming plans to update three existing biomes in Minecraft: Taiga, Desert and Savanna, with the players deciding which biome to update first through a vote. And the winner was…祝贺，针叶林！ 您在直播期间获得了最多的选票，因此您将成为我们优先更新新生物和新特性的生物群系！ 别担心，沙漠和热带草原的粉丝——我们仍会及时更新这些生物群系。Congratulations, Taiga! You got the most votes during the livestream, so you'll be the next biome we update with new features and a new mob! Don't worry, Desert and Savanna fans – we'll still be updating those biomes in time.我们热爱让我们的玩家参与这样的决策当中，非常感谢所有参与投票的人！We love involving our players in decisions like these so a massive thank you to everyone who voted!灵感岛INSPIRATION ISLAND
一个新的市场内容，对所有Minecraft玩家都是免费的！ 参观灵感岛，一个充满创意挑战的飞行主题公园。 无论您是创造模式的新手，还是只需要一点额外的灵感，访问这里都会让您踏上自己创造开创性世界的道路。 当你离开这个岛屿时，你将成为一个真正的蓝领创造者，学会强大的技能来制作令人敬畏的东西！A new piece of Marketplace content that’ll be free to all Minecraft players! Visit Inspiration Island, a floating theme park world filled with creative challenges. Whether you are new to Creative Mode or just need a little extra inspiration, a visit here sets you on the path to craft your own groundbreaking worlds. By the time you leave the island, you’ll be a true blue creator, armed with loads of skills to make awesome things!灵感岛将是免费的，并将于今年晚些时候在我的世界市场上发布。Inspiration Island will be free, and will be released in the Minecraft Marketplace later this year.汤姆终于不必担心《我的世界：地下城》的消息在MINECON公布之前走漏风声了TOM CAN FINALLY GO TO BED AND STOP WORRYING ABOUT MINECRAFT: DUNGEONS LEAKING BEFORE THE MINECON ANNOUNCEMENT万岁！ 这可能是最令我感到高兴的事情。 嗯，仅次于大熊猫。Hooray! This was probably my favourite thing we announced. Well, after the pandas.就是这样！ 感谢您观看MINECON Earth 2018，并密切关注Minecraft.net，了解有关这些令人兴奋的最新信息。 现在我要去做一些紧急睡眠......好吧，实际上，也许我会再看看《我的世界：地下城》的页面......And that's it! Thanks for being part of MINECON Earth 2018 and keep your eyes on Minecraft.net for more updates about these 亦可赛艇 new things soon. Now I'm off to get some much-needed sleep... well, actually, maybe I'll take a look at the Minecraft: Dungeons page one more time...我们是不是该用一个很酷的视频作结尾，展示这一系列更新吗？ 那还用你说？Shall we end on a cool video that shows off some of these updates? YOU EVEN NEED TO ASK?[bili=32725545]1[/bili]
原文：https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/article/everything-we-announced-minecon-earth-2018作者：Tom Stone原文发表时间：2018年9月29日

这个Add on是类似基岩版的那个修改实体模型吗，那真是太好了...等等...有提到是java的add on吗
 ...
应该没有Java版，add-nos和API都是基岩版的。看样子新的add-nos已经可以实现Java版小型的扩展性MOD了，多世界、新事件或者新行为应该为API管的。更重要的是这些插件理论上是官方支持服务端的，也支持服务端同步(现在的addons就是)，也就是说不用一个服务器配一个整合包了。
